document_data.caption: A sample of titania sand.
document_data.name: Titania
document_data.mainbody:
{{Otheruses4|the material|the Faerie Queen|Titania}}
'''Titania''' was a processed mineral sand used for various trades.
document_data.Crafting: Titania was made from the mineral [[ilmenite]] through an obscure and little-known process.
document_data.Usages:
[[File:White Enamel.png|thumb|''White titania enamel.'']]
* Titania was used for making bright, white pigment, such as those used in [[enamel]].
